lenders.name: Walter E
lenders.loan_because: The world is hard enough without people helping. My Lord Jesus asks me to help my fellow world people. We are all one. We live until the Angels come. Our Father who art in Heaven Hollowed be thy name. Thy will be done in Earth as it is in Heaven. Give us this day our daily bread. Forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors. Lead us not unto temptation but deliver us from Evil for thine is the Kingdom, The Power and the Glory forever, Amen.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get loans for automobiles.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: People need loans.

lenders.name: Katrina
lenders.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is the greatest gift of all.

lenders.name: Ursula
lenders.loan_because: It's so much fun!
lenders.occupational_info: I get to sit at a computer all day and play with pretty pictures.

lenders.name: Mark and Elissa
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it can provide change for those receiving the loan. It is a small way to make life better for someone.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: well, I'm getting so poor that I realize there are no more excuses not to help.  Rich is never coming, but I can help someone with my US$
lenders.occupational_info: I help people on a one on one basis with skills they do not have, like putting great books online, organizing research, hosting people at a country inn.

lenders.name: Darrell
lenders.loan_because:
I believe we are all one and by helping individuals we help everyone... 

The butterfly effect...
lenders.occupational_info: I manage large technology projects for companies in the United States.  I create the plan and then manage the execution to achieve the goals.

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance, and those of us who have had that chance should empower others to have it too.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a minister of the Gospel of Jesus Christ, who tells us to bring freedom to the captives, recovery of sight to the blind, and to love our neighbor as ourselves.

lenders.name: Emily and Madeline
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others.

lenders.name: Bruno
lenders.loan_because: Traditional banking or government lending does not reach the people who need credit the most.  I want people in need of financing to know there are people in the "rich" world who care about them.  I like the transparency that KIVA's business model which enables person-to-person lending.

lenders.name: guion and john
lenders.loan_because: something small that costs us nothing can potentially make the difference to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: hard

lenders.name: Margie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to be self sustaining.  I believe that is what we all want.  Some of us have more fortunate circumstances.  I also believe human nature is naturally good, kind and caring about others.  If I can help relieve one spec of suffering that is good.  If we all did that...woo hoo, that is great!

lenders.name: Vince
lenders.loan_because: I was provided a KIVA gift cirtificate and see this as an opportunity to try to help strugling people in other parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage and administer benefit plans for a leading Canadian food company.

lenders.name: LaRae Kendrick
lenders.loan_because: I own my own business and want others to have the same opportunity!

lenders.name: Hilary Little
lenders.loan_because: I can. I was fortunate to be born in Canada where I enjoy a life of freedom, opportunity and comfort. This is how I pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I design things that are easy and enjoyable to use.

lenders.name: Nataraj
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to help out somebody who is in need.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.
lenders.occupational_info: I do treatment with, and counsel adolescents living in a group home.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: "No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted." -Aesop

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I love to support other people who are working to make a go of it.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with people who are dying to help them feel peaceful and calm.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: Having lived in Africa I realize how far a dollar can go to help out a struggling family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college professor.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to achieve their goals.

lenders.name: Georges
lenders.occupational_info: Working to create businesses that have a positive impact on nature and people.

lenders.name: John

lenders.occupational_info: Ship spare parts around the world for global chemical company.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because:
I can...
Many others have not enough, much less anything to spare. I have been blessed in so many ways, the least I can do is give what I can and spread the word.

lenders.name: Luke & Rachel

lenders.occupational_info: I use my talents to keep my family comfortable, secure and filled with joy. lenders.name: patrick
lenders.occupation: work in a travel software company
lenders.loan_because: I am impressed with the whole philosophy of micro lending and the emense benefits it can bring to individuals, their families and communities. I'm glad to support your efforts and thank Kiva for facilitation this through their website.

lenders.name: Manny & Linda
lenders.loan_because: Because to loan to the poor is to loan to God.

lenders.name: Kimber

lenders.occupational_info: Working to incorporate technology into public education to help kids learn in an engaging way.

lenders.name: Helen

lenders.loan_because: I have no reason not to

lenders.name: Whitney
lenders.loan_because: I want to put my efforts toward a good cause.  I see too much wasted on expensive things that leave people void of meaning or purpose in their life.  To devote your time and money to helping others is what will truly give your (and other's) life meaning.  So here I am!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a small family office, Mon-Thurs, about 7 hours a day.  I'm an assistant and mainly handle personal errands and tasks for my employer.  On Fridays I volunteer at a women's outreach facility.  I'm hoping to go back to school for nursing very soon.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy success stories.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find a home.

lenders.name: Ty :)
lenders.loan_because: My grandpa is an amazing, compassionate person dedicated to helping others who are less fortunate than I. We donate together.

lenders.name: Darío
lenders.loan_because: Supporting projects world wide you give the opportunity to develop them in their countries.

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: I think my money will go a lot farther towards helping people through Kiva than if I just gave it to people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Brigham Young University student

lenders.name: Hopcia Children
lenders.loan_because: we want to help the people
lenders.occupational_info: children

lenders.name: The Scott Family
lenders.loan_because: Our family has been very fortunate in life and we would love to be able to pass some of that happiness on to other families around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop methods for computer companies to get things done in a more productive and profitable manner.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: a little goes such a long way

lenders.name: Lee-Anne
lenders.loan_because: I want others to have the ability to create their lives in the way that they dream they  can
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who are socially disadvantaged and link them to programs that enable them to change the direction their life is taking and in my other job I look after muscle aches and pains that prevent them from moving properly

lenders.loan_because: I would like to leave this world a little better than when I arrived in it.
lenders.occupational_info: Outside of the office my work is raising a great young soul (my son)  to be a great man in this world.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to adults who don't have English as their first language. My real passion is music--more specificaly, singing.

lenders.name: Seamus
lenders.loan_because: I am privileged to have enough resources to do so.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I'm teaching my kids about both business and helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm co-founder & CEO of a digital agency.

lenders.name: Satrajpal
lenders.loan_because:
I have more than I need and by helping others is a way of making a positive impact in people's lives I otehrwise could not and would not get to meet or help out.

One day I can look back and show my 3 year old son that he too can make a difference in somone's life eve if they live on the otherside of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Telecommunciations Company as a Cellular Technical Analyst

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I make interactive content for children.

lenders.loan_because: I am impressed by the powerful impact microlending has around the world.

lenders.name: Thierry
lenders.loan_because: I believe in personal intiative more than assistantship

lenders.name: Caroline and Hunter
lenders.loan_because: We are able to have a good life because people have supported us. Its only fair to continue to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: Hunter and I both work in internet services for large corporations. I focus on the creative side (graphics and such). Hunter focuses on software development and consulting.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because:
I love Jesus.

"A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another. By this all men will know that you are my disciples, if you love one another."  - John 13: 34-35

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: I have been an entrepreneur for most of my career and I appreciate the challenges in running a business.  Sometimes a helping hand makes all the difference, and I hope that I can do my part to help those who need that little extra push.
lenders.occupational_info:
My take on life is pretty simple – do what you love, be honest, open, and respectful, and follow your heart.  My goal is to collaborate with incredible, passionate individuals and organizations that are interested in making a positive difference in the world. I believe we can all play our part, and my intention is to keep this top of mind in my work life in addition to my personal life.

I help socially conscious individuals and organizations develop their digital marketing and social media strategy.

I’m an entrepreneur that understands the challenges other small businesses and change makers face in the increasingly competitive online space.  I help navigate the waters of the web and social media, and provide relatable, easy-to-follow, and timely strategic advice that allow these businesses and individuals to flourish.

lenders.name: wayne
lenders.loan_because: I like to help small business people who may not have a chance otherwise.
lenders.occupational_info: Accommodation supplier

lenders.occupational_info: I am a financial freedom fighter. My mission is to inspire and empower you to live your highest values with courage, ease and grace

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled around the world and have seen the poverty that others have to fight through everyday.  Just because a person doesn't have a lot of money does not mean that they should give up on their dreams.  I would like to help others accomplish their goals and see them go where they want to in life because I feel that there are no limits.  Just remember to never give up, your time is just around the corner!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a young college student who attends Indiana University.  I am studying business and I'm going for a major in Business Administration.

lenders.name: charles
lenders.loan_because: "entreprendre"is a important part in my life and i want to share ang give the chance to others to have this accomplisment in their live
lenders.occupational_info: help people and people in a organisation to keep the sense and the responsability of each one job

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I think it is an effective method of improving lives in 3rd world countries. It can provide longer term solutions and possible spin-offs that can benefit people and communities more effectively than just giving to charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the mineral extraction industry

lenders.name: Audrey
lenders.loan_because: I am an 87 year old christian lady and I want to make a positive impact upon the world. I love the idea of helping someone in a thrid world country to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been retired for many years. I don't even own a computer! My grandaughter, Dawn, who is also a micro loan lender, put me onto this wonderful program.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate all that I have and believe that everyone deserves the chance to be everything that they want to be but they might need a little help along the way.

lenders.name: Paige
lenders.loan_because: I care
